mapper.insert: insert into cart (cart_id, userid, product_id, amount) values (SEQ_CART.nextval, #{userid}, #{product_id}, #{amount})
mapper.select: select cart_id, p.product_id, c.userid, name as user_name, product_name, amount, product_price as price , (product_priceamount) as money from member m, product p, cart c where c.userid = m.userid and c.product_id = p.product_id and c.userid = #{userid} order by cart_id

select cart_id, p.product_id, c.userid, name as user_name, product_name, amount, product_price as price , (product_priceamount) as money from member m, product p, cart c where c.userid = m.userid and c.product_id = p.product_id and c.userid = #{userid} order by cart_id
select nvl(sum(product_price*amount),0) from cart c, product p where c.product_id = p.product_id and userid = #{userid}
select product_name, sum(product_price * amount) money from cart c, product p where c.product_id = p.product_id GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY product_name
select count(*) from cart c where c.product_id = #{product_id} and c.userid = #{userid}
